title: Creates tenants' right to recover certain attorneys' fees incurred as a result of service of notice based upon false facts or allegations
summary: Creates tenants' right to recover certain attorneys' fees incurred as a result of service of notice based upon false facts or allegations.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to tenants' right to recover attorneys' fees incurred as a result of service of notice based upon false facts or allegations
